last_episode_to_air.name: Rio Ferdinand: Being Mum and Dad
last_episode_to_air.overview: Rio Ferdinand: Being Mum and Dad. Documentary following Rio Ferdinand a year after losing his wife to cancer as he tries to come to terms with the loss and its effects on him and his three children. In May 2015 Rio Ferdinand lost his 34-year-old wife Rebecca to cancer.
